body: mutation {updatecampaign (campaign: {id: "75274431-7de3-4836-82eb-568fc368f88d", name: "Testing Campaign2", description: "An updated campaign description." allow_prepaid: false, show_prepaid: false, productschedules:["12529a17-ac32-4e46-b05b-83862843055d"], emailtemplates:["b44ce483-861c-4843-a7d6-b4c649d6bdde"], affiliate_allow:["*"], affiliate_deny:["ad58ea78-504f-4a7e-ad45-128b6e76dc57"] } ) { id, name, allow_prepaid, show_prepaid, created_at, updated_at, productschedules { id, merchantprovidergroup{ id, merchantproviderconfigurations { merchantprovider { id, name, processor { name }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio, transaction_counts { daily, weekly, monthly } }, enabled, gateway { ... on NMI { name, username, password, processor_id } ... on Innovio { name, username, password, product_id } ... on Stripe {name, api_key} }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description }, created_at, updated_at }, distribution }, created_at, updated_at }, schedule { price, start, end, period, product { id, name, sku, ship, shipping_delay, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { name } } } } }, emailtemplates { id, name, subject, body, type, smtp_provider{ id, name, hostname, username, password, port } }, affiliate_allow { ... on AffiliateGroup { id, name } ... on Affiliate { id, affiliate_id, name, created_at, updated_at } } affiliate_deny { ... on AffiliateGroup { id, name } ... on Affiliate { id, affiliate_id, name, created_at, updated_at } } } }
